panels.brickConf: {"brick":"presentational-bricks.brick-table","properties":{"rowKey":"time","page":"${query.page=1|number}","pageSize":"${query.pageSize=10|number}","columns":[{"title":"time","dataIndex":"time","key":"time"},{"title":"连接名","dataIndex":"connect_name","key":"connect_name"},{"title":"会话地址","dataIndex":"connect_saddr","key":"connect_saddr"},{"title":"创建时间","dataIndex":"connect_create_time","key":"connect_create_time"},{"title":"连接状态","dataIndex":"connect_status","key":"connect_status"},{"title":"IP 地址","dataIndex":"connect_ip_addr","key":"connect_ip_addr"}]},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-query","args":[{"model":"easyops.HOST","dims":["time(1m)","connect_name"],"measures":[{"name":"connect_saddr","function":{"expression":"last","args":["connect_saddr"]}},{"name":"connect_create_time","function":{"expression":"last","args":["connect_create_time"]}},{"name":"connect_status","function":{"expression":"last","args":["connect_status"]}},{"name":"connect_ip_addr","function":{"expression":"last","args":["connect_ip_addr"]}}],"filters":[{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${QUERY.instanceId|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"${QUERY.from=\"now-1h\"|string}"},{"name":"connect_name","operator":"!=","value":"null"},{"name":"time","operator":"<=","value":"<% parseInt(+moment() / 1000) %>"}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}],"limitBy":{"expressions":["connect_name"],"limit":1}}],"transform":{"dataSource":"@{}"},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}
panels.title: 连接详情

panels.brickConf: {"brick":"presentational-bricks.brick-table","properties":{"rowKey":"time","page":"${query.page=1|number}","pageSize":"${query.pageSize=10|number}","columns":[{"title":"time","dataIndex":"time","key":"time"},{"title":"会话序列号","dataIndex":"sess_seq","key":"sess_seq"},{"title":"会话 ID","dataIndex":"sess_id","key":"sess_id"},{"title":"会话状态","dataIndex":"sess_state","key":"sess_state"},{"title":"当前模式","dataIndex":"sess_curr_sch","key":"sess_curr_sch"},{"title":"会话创建时间","dataIndex":"sess_create_time","key":"sess_create_time"}]},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-query","args":[{"model":"easyops.HOST","dims":["time(1m)","sess_seq"],"measures":[{"name":"sess_id","function":{"expression":"last","args":["sess_id"]}},{"name":"sess_state","function":{"expression":"last","args":["sess_state"]}},{"name":"sess_curr_sch","function":{"expression":"last","args":["sess_curr_sch"]}},{"name":"sess_create_time","function":{"expression":"last","args":["sess_create_time"]}}],"filters":[{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${QUERY.instanceId|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"${QUERY.from=\"now-1h\"|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":"<=","value":"<% parseInt(+moment() / 1000) %>"}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}],"limitBy":{"expressions":["sess_seq"],"limit":1}}],"transform":{"dataSource":"@{}"},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}
